mapper.select: select count(address) as cnt, CONCAT(addrType1, " ", shopName) as shopName from lotto_address group by address order by cnt desc limit 0,10 ;
select num1, num2, num3, num4, num5, num6, bonusNum as num7 from lotto_master;
select * from lotto_master a, lotto_detail b where a.drawNo = b.drawNo order by totalSellingPrice desc LIMIT 1;
select num1, num2, num3, num4, num5, num6, bonusNum as num7, drawNo from lotto_master order by masterNum desc limit 1;
select count(*) as cnt, addrType1 from lotto_address where address is not null group by addrType1 order by cnt desc;
select count(*) as cnt , gameType from lotto_address where address is not null group by gameType;
select count(*) as cnt, addrType1, addrType2 from lotto_address where address is not null group by addrType2 order by cnt desc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lotto_master ( drawNo, drawDate, num1, num2, num3, num4, num5, num6, bonusNum, totalSellingPrice, c_date, c_time ) VALUES ( #{drawNo}, #{drawDate}, #{num1}, #{num2}, #{num3}, #{num4}, #{num5}, #{num6}, #{bonusNum}, #{totalSellingPrice}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%H:%i:%s') );

INSERT INTO lotto_detail ( masterNum, drawNo, drawDate, lottoRank, sellingPriceByRank, winningPriceByRank, winningCnt, c_date, c_time ) VALUES ( #{masterNum}, #{drawNo}, #{drawDate}, #{lottoRank}, #{sellingPriceByRank}, #{winningPriceByRank}, #{winningCnt}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%H:%i:%s') );

INSERT INTO lotto_address ( drawNo, gameType, shopName, address, addrType1, addrType2, lat, lng, drawDate, c_date, c_time ) values ( #{drawNo}, #{gameType}, #{shopName}, #{address}, #{addrType1}, #{addrType2}, #{lat}, #{lng}, drawDate, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%H:%i:%s') );
